title: 45.6 P Land Sell @ Parliament Road
details:
*- The land is located in in Parliament Road, Jayanthipura.

*- Total land size : 45.6 perches

*- Clear title (quick process to get a bank loan)

*- 20 Feet wide road to the land from the Jayanthipura Road.

*- 500m to Parliament

*- The land can be used for multiple purposes.

*- Flat, high, square shape bare land Ideal for your dream home with a big garden

*- Respectable neighborhood. Water, electricity and all other facilities are avalble

*- It’s a very rare block of that quality close to the Parliament.

*- We highly encourage to view the land before discuss the price.

Rs 2.7 Million a Perches
